Texts.Chs: 把^orange;军械库^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Armory^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我就直接了当的说吧。我需要一个属于自己的^orange;军械库^reset;，但我并不知道如何建造。也许你可以帮我在你的^orange;物质汇编机^reset;里造一个？
Texts.Eng: I'll be blunt. I need my own ^orange;Armory^reset; but lack the skill to create one. Could you perhaps ^orange;make one for me in your Matter Assembler^reset;?.
Thanks a heap. Here, take this off my hands.
